glsa.title: lighttpd: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in lighttpd, allowing remote attackers cause a Denial of Service condition or execute arbitrary SQL statements.

background.p: lighttpd is a lightweight high-performance web server.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in lighttpd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could create a Denial of Service condition. Futhermore, a remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary SQL statements.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All lighttpd users should upgrade to the latest version:
